title: Error Status 0xc0000020 aka Can't Open Client

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: It started yesterday when I tried to open League and got the LeagueClient.exe- Bad Image error notification. I was told to do a uninstall and reinstall. I did that and I worked fine for the rest of the day. I got back on today and it doing that same error message again. So then I ran the Hextech Repair Tool, assuming it would replace the missing or corrupted files but no, It told me to go to in the LoL Logs (which I have attached). Is there a solution to this besides having to uninstall and reinstall every time I want to play the game?

replies.body: This can happen if your OS or antivirus has changed, so it's blocking game files and not allowing it to install properly.  I can definitely see this being stressful, but our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should be able to help here.  Once complete, though, you may need to reinstall again to make sure it's all installed properly.  I hope that helps!

I did that and It still does the same thing. 
_**Window Update option**_: I have windows 10 up to date ( https://imgur.com/a/DNTXv )
_**Running the Game as Admin**_: Still the same error, even when logged in on the admin side
_**Check your Hard Drive for errors**_: No errors were found ( https://imgur.com/mYt1QcP )
_**Disable UAC**_: Why would that work?

So is there anything else that could be done? 



Plus all these files are all over my desktop .dll. https://imgur.com/a/vKxiU

That's strange, usually the guide helps resolve this and I'm sorry about that desktop litter.  :(  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) in this case, and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  This will allow our tech team to take a look with more context and help you out directly.
I did that Hextech Repair Tool AND sent in a ticket. http://gph.is/1jkh65a

By the way, where are you installing League exactly?  Make sure it's going to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends.  It almost looks like it's installing to your Desktop, and that can cause issues if you're using Hextech Repair Tool to reinstall there.
Great, a specialist will reach out as soon as they can!
